title: Drifting Away
raw_lyrics:
So long ago I was anchored
Was faith that held me down
Now I’m lost in an ocean of sorrow
No light to guide me to ground

I’m drifting away to loneliness
Drifting away drifting away
Drifting seep into emptiness
Drifting away without you

I’ve strayed to far from land
For the Lord to hear my last plea
I’m on a ship with no captain
In waters rough as could be

If I were to throw myself over
Oh to see you there in the light
Would I sink to the depths of the ocean
To a place that’s dark as the night
